CODE COMPARATIVE TABLE - ORDINANCES
modified
This table gives the location within this Code of those ordinances adopted since the 1987 Code, which code was current through August 11, 1987, which are included herein. Ordinances adopted prior to such date were incorporated into the 1987 Code. Ordinances adopted since August 11, 1987, and not listed herein, have been omitted as repealed, superseded or not of a general and permanent nature.
EXPAND
Ordinance

this Code
